entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and protagonist of the story. He is lying awake in bed, thinking about Ginny.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is Harry's friend and Ron's sister. She is the object of Harry's thoughts and feelings.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend and Ginny's brother. He is sleeping in bed next to Harry.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is a character mentioned in the story as someone that Ron and Phlegm are associated with.

entities.name: phlegm
entities.description: Phlegm is a character mentioned in the story as someone that Bill and Ron are associated with.

relationships.description: Harry has feelings for Ginny, which he tries to convince himself are brotherly. He wants to protect her and look out for her.
Harry is friends with Ron, and does not want to risk their friendship by pursuing Ginny.
